fullplot: A young fox named Tod is taken in by an old woman after his mother is killed by a hunter. Full of mischief, Young Tod befriends Copper, a hound dog pup. As they grow up, however, their friendship becomes endangered by what they have become; Copper is a hunting dog, and Tod is his prey.
plot: Two childhood friends find themselves forced to become enemies.
title: The Fox and the Hound

tomatoes.consensus: The Fox and the Hound is a likeable, charming, unassuming effort that manages to transcend its thin, predictable plot.

writers: Daniel P. Mannix (based on the book by)
